verses.verse: (PSALM 23) (The LORD, the Psalmistâ€™s Shepherd.) (A Psalm of David.) The LORD is my shepherd, I will not be in need.
He lets me lie down in green pastures; He leads me beside (Lit waters of rest) quiet waters.
He restores my soul; He guides me in the (Lit tracks) paths of righteousness For the sake of His name.
Even though I walk through the (Or valley of deep darkness) valley of the shadow of death, I fear no (Or harm) evil, for You are with me; Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me.
You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies; You (Or anoint) have anointed my head with oil; My cup overflows.
(Or Only) Certainly goodness and (Or mercy) faithfulness will follow me all the days of my life, And my dwelling will be in the house of the LORD (Lit for length of days) forever.
